attributes.action: Set up somewhere for us the British Public to complain about our Government and their offices and to be heard
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am fed up with not having somewhere to complain about the services that the British Government and all their Civil Service offices provide us the British public. What they do provide us with currently never listens anyway, therefore any office set up should be run by ley people and be completley impartial and all complaints should be published so that people can add to them if they find they are in the same situation, then and only then after a set time of publication it is acknowledged and answered with proper promises not spin.
